trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Interage com o analisador para criar um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The TextBoxControlBuilder class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe TextBoxControlBuilder é uma classe auxiliar interno usada com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder>classe é uma classe auxiliar interno usada com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether white-space literals are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o espaço em branco literais são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para ignorar espaço em branco no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the literal string of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a cadeia de caracteres literal a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"> </xref> controle deve ser decodificado de HTML.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlDecodeLiterals method to determine whether the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: Use o método HtmlDecodeLiterals para determinar se a cadeia de caracteres literal a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>controle deve ser HTML decodificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method always returns `true` to indicate that the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação do método sempre retorna `true` para indicar que a cadeia de caracteres literal a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>controle deve ser HTML decodificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.
